about_the_game:
Please pay special attention

The experience you're enjoying in this demo is just the beginning of the expansive world we offer. In the main game, you will encounter a wider array of sports disciplines, far beyond what this demo presents. Moreover, an enchanting water park awaits, perfect for enjoyment with family and friends. After getting a taste of the basics through this demo, discover more adventures and fun in the main game. Feel the true passion of summer with us!

Welcome to our exciting virtual experience! Immerse yourself in the "All-in-One Summer Sports VR Demo" and explore the dynamic world of tropical resort adventure that spans three popular summer sports games. Compete globally or with friends, hone your skills across multiple difficulty levels, and strive for victory in challenging competitions. Create your own unique character and enjoy a journey to dominate these scorching summer sports challenges!

JET SKI

Experience high-octane jet ski racing on a picturesque tropical island. Avoid obstacles, strategically use various items, and race against friends in a heart-pounding adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

GUN SHOOTING

Immerse yourself in the virtual reality shooting experience of Gun Shooting. Test your accuracy, reaction time, and target tracking skills on a variety of shooting ranges and environments. Feel the thrill of authentic shooting simulations with a selection of realistic firearms and shooting modes.

WATER BASKETBALL

Dive into the refreshing world of Water Basketball, a unique take on the classic game played in swimming pools. Master dribbling, passing, and shooting while navigating the water, emphasizing teamwork, strategy, and aquatic mobility for a splashing good time.

WATER PARK

Explore the exhilarating attractions of our virtual water park. From thrilling waterslides to immersive experiences, enjoy a day of fun and excitement with your loved ones. Share unforgettable moments with family and friends as you enter the cool world of virtual reality water park adventures.

name: All-In-One Summer Sports VR Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (32/64-BIT)
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Room Scale 2m by 1.5m area required
  • Additional Notes: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (32/64-BIT)
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 980 equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer

short_description: Welcome to the Summer Sports VR Demo! Dive into the excitement of three thrilling summer sports. Head to a hot tropical island full of sunshine, fun and unforgettable experiences. Craft your unique character and compete against players worldwide in action-packed games!
supported_languages:
English*, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
